rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A grand hall with marble columns and ancient tapestries. Your journey begins here.

rooms.name: Ancient Library
rooms.description: Towering shelves filled with dusty tomes and scrolls containing the wisdom of ages.

rooms.name: Royal Armory
rooms.description: Gleaming weapons and armor line the walls, telling tales of ancient battles.

rooms.name: Celestial Observatory
rooms.description: A dome-topped chamber with telescopes pointing toward the stars and celestial charts covering the walls.

rooms.name: Royal Throne Room
rooms.description: The heart of the castle, where the final challenge awaits. Golden throne gleams in the torchlight.
